contentList.content: %%%Technical status to apply the clone shader.
After you cast a spell or higher you can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Mesmer_SummonClone">Fly</LSTag> as a <LSTag Tooltip="Bonus_Action">bonus action</LSTag> until the end of your turn.
Grant the ability to summon an illusory clone.
Grant the ability to summon an illusory clone.
Explode in a burst of fire.
You can use the Shatter feature.
Affected entity has a [1] active clone.
Gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, damage, and <LSTag Tooltip="SpellDifficultyClass">Spell Save DC</LSTag> for every foe you slay, up to a maximum of +[2].
Affected entity has a [1] active clone.
Takes [1] per turn and additional [2] damage each time they cast a spell.
Explode in a burst of fire.
You take [1] when you cast a spell.
Create a dome around your foes that reflects projectiles.
A blazing wall of fire that deals [2] to anyone within [1].
Engulfed in a wall of blazing flames. The affected entity takes [2] per turn it stays within [1] of the fire.
<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CONFUSION">Confuse</LSTag> a group of creatures, causing them to attack at random, wander around aimlessly, and occasionally skip turns in the stupor.
The next time damage would reduce the affected entity to 0 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>, it remains conscious with [2] hit point left.

When you kill a creature, your next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> will be a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>. Once spent, this effect refreshes after a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.

When you kill a creature, your next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> will be a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>. Once spent, this effect refreshes after a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.

When you deal spell damage, gain [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charge</LSTag>. While attuned to Kereska's Bolt you can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ChainLightning">Chain Lightning</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_LightningBolt">Lightning Bolt</LSTag>.

Affected entity has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Lightning damage. Its lightning spells deal additional Lightning damage equal to its <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.When it deals spell damage, it gains [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charge</LSTag>. While attuned to Kereska's lightning, it can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ChainLightning">Chain Lightning</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_LightningBolt">Lightning Bolt</LSTag>.
Make a pillar of divine fire roar down from the heavens like the wrath of affronted angels.
Grant the ability to summon an illusory clone.
Affected entity is <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to all damage, but when it attacks it heals [1].
Grant the ability to summon an illusory clone.
Grant the ability to summon an illusory clone.
Make a pillar of divine fire roar down from the heavens like the wrath of affronted angels.
Grant the ability to summon an illusory clone.
Grant the ability to summon an illusory clone.
Grant the ability to summon an illusory clone.
Grant the ability to summon an illusory clone.
The number you need to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> while attacking is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.
Stacking(turns) buff that heals by proficiency of the source every turn.
Your next weapon attack only deals half damage.
Your next weapon attack only deals half damage.
Creature can take one additional action per turn.
Possibly knock your enemy <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Possibly knock your enemy <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Grant the ability to summon an illusory clone.
Possibly knock your enemy <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.

Possibly knock your enemy <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.

Grant the ability to summon an illusory clone.
Grant the ability to summon an illusory clone.
Grant the ability to summon an illusory clone.
Possibly knock your enemy <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Possibly knock your enemy <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Possibly knock your enemy <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Stacking(turns) buff that heals by proficiency of the source every turn.
Possibly knock your enemy <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Charge forward and attack the first enemy in your way, possibly pushing them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="OFF_BALANCED">Off Balance</LSTag>.
Strike out at all nearby foes, making separate <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attack rolls</LSTag> against each target.

Takes [1] at the start of each turn and has Disadvantage on Constitution Saving Throws.

Removed by healing.
Charge forward, attacking all enemies in the way and possibly knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Plants take maximum damage from this spell, and have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on the <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> against it.
Retaliate with a formidable strike when a creature misses you with a melee attack.
When a creature misses you with a melee attack, you can retaliate with a powerful strike that deals an additional 1d8 damage if you are wielding a melee weapon.

Takes [1] at the start of each turn and has Disadvantage on Constitution Saving Throws.

Removed by healing.

Takes [1] at the start of each turn and has Disadvantage on Constitution Saving Throws.

Removed by healing.
Give yourself positive conditions and your foe random negative conditions whenever you are struck.
%%% Technical status; doesn't need to be destubbed.
Creature can take one additional action per turn.

Takes [1] at the start of each turn and has Disadvantage on Constitution Saving Throws.

Removed by healing.
Stacking(turns) buff that heals by proficiency of the source every turn.
Reduces the target's <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> by [1].
A blazing wall of fire that deals [2] to anyone within [1].
Engulfed in a wall of blazing flames. The affected entity takes [2] per turn it stays within [1] of the fire.
Surrounded by silver mist, you teleport to an unoccupied space you can see.
Creature can take one additional action per turn.
Creature can take one additional action per turn.
Stacking(turns) buff that heals by proficiency of the source every turn.
Shield yourself from a spell attack: when you fail a Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> on a spell, you only take half damage. When you succeed, you take no damage.
Explode in a burst of fire.
Explode in a burst of fire.
Stacking(turns) buff that heals by proficiency of the source every turn.
Swap positions with your Illusionary Leap Clone

<LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> can't be reduced by Difficult Terrain, spells, or magical effects. Can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralysed</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag>.
A sphere of utter blackness and bitter cold. It emits a cacophony of soft whispers and slurping noises.

A sphere of cold blackness, teeming with unknown horrors.

Creatures starting their turn in the area take [1]. Creatures ending their turn in the area possibly take [2].

The area is Difficult Terrain, and creatures within are Blinded.
Creatures within this black sphere are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag> and take damage at the end of their turn and the start of their turn.

Creatures starting their turn in the area take [1]. Creatures ending their turn in the area possibly take [2].

The area is Difficult Terrain.

Locusts attack everyone within range, make the area <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>, and impose <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on Perception <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
<LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> halved. <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on Perception <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.

Swarming, biting locusts fill the air. They deal [1] per turn, make the area <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>, and impose <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on Perception <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
<LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> halved. <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on Perception <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.

Surrounded by silver mist, you teleport to an unoccupied space you can see.
Surrounded by silver mist, you teleport to an unoccupied space you can see.

Its lightning spells deal additional Lightning damage equal to its <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.When it deals spell damage, it gains [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charge</LSTag>. Its lightning spells deal additional Lightning damage equal to its <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.When it deals spell damage, it gains [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charge</LSTag>. While attuned to Kereska's lightning, it can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ChainLightning">Chain Lightning</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_LightningBolt">Lightning Bolt</LSTag>.

Affected entity has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Lightning damage. Its lightning spells deal additional Lightning damage equal to its <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.When it deals spell damage, it gains [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charge</LSTag>. While attuned to Kereska's lightning, it can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ChainLightning">Chain Lightning</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_LightningBolt">Lightning Bolt</LSTag>.
Reduces the target's <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> by [1].
Reduces the target's <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> by [1].
Make a pillar of divine fire roar down from the heavens like the wrath of affronted angels.
Shatter skills inflict 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GW_VULNERABILITY">Vulnerability</LSTag> on hit.
<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GW_DAZE">Dizzy</LSTag> of stunning an enemy also inflicts 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GW_VULNERABILITY">Vulnerability</LSTag>.
Gain 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GW_QUICKNESS">Quickness</LSTag> when you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GW_DISABLE">Disable</LSTag> an enemy.
Deal [1] and inflict 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GW_WEAKNESS">Weakness</LSTag> when you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GW_DISABLE">Disable</LSTag> an enemy.
Disabled enemies are ones that are Stunned, [[Conditions#Dizzy(Daze)|Dizzy]], Prone or Frightened.
When you land a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> against a creature, inflict 2 turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag> on that creature.
<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Mesmer_Shatter_CryOfFrustration">Shatter: Cry of Frustration</LSTag> inflicts 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag>.
The number you need to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> while attacking is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.

While under the effect of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GW_FURY">Fury</LSTag>: The number you need to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> while attacking is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.

Your <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag> deal more damage. Critical Hit damage against <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GW_DISABLE">Disabled</LSTag> enemies, is further increased. Add an extra dice of weapon damage to any critical you land. Add an additional dice of weapon damage if the target is Disabled.

Gain 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GW_CHAOS_AURA">Chaos Aura</LSTag> when you use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Mesmer_Shatter_CryOfFrustration">Shatter: Cry of Frustration</LSTag> for each clone shattered.
Gain access to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Interrupt_Method_of_Madness">Method of Madness</LSTag>.

Locusts attack everyone within range, make the area <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>, and impose <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on Perception <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Gaining <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GW_CHAOS_AURA">Chaos Aura</LSTag> grants 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GW_REGENERATION">Regeneration</LSTag> to nearby(10m) allies.

Gain 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GW_STABILITY">Stability</LSTag> when you use a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Mesmer_Shatter_Container">Shatter</LSTag> skill. Grant an additional boon to nearby allies based on which Shatter is used.

<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Mesmer_Shatter_Distortion">Shatter: Distortion</LSTag> grants 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GW_PROTECTION">Protection</LSTag> and breaks allies who are within 10m of a shattered clone out of stun.
Once per turn, create a clone when you heal an ally.
Increase healing to other allies. You restore an additional [1] every time you heal another creature.
When you use a charge of a Mantra: Heals allies within [1] of you by [2].
When you use a charge of a Mantra: Heals allies within [1] of you by [2].
Shatter skills 1,2 and 3 inflict 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GW_TORMENT">Torment</LSTag> on hit.
<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Mesmer_Shatter_Container">Shatter</LSTag> skills generate a clone if you have enough (3) clones present.
<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GW_DISABLE">Disabling</LSTag> an enemy <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLOW">slows</LSTag> them for 1 turn.
Gain access to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Mesmer_Shatter_Chronomancer_Container">Chronomancer Shatters</LSTag> and Wells.
The number you need to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> while attacking is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.
<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Mesmer_Shatter_Container">Shatter</LSTag> skills generate a clone if you have enough (3) clones present.
Gain access to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Mesmer_MirageCloak">Mirage Cloak</LSTag>, during which ambush skills may be used.
<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MESMER_MIRAGE_CLOAK">Mirage Cloak</LSTag> increases your movement speed by [1].
<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Mesmer_Shatter_Container">Shatter</LSTag> skills grant <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MESMER_MIRAGE_CLOAK">Mirage Cloak</LSTag> when 2 or more clones are present.

Whenever a clone would be summoned, you instead stock a blade. Blades persist indefinitely until used. Your shatters are replaced with Bladesongs that consume your stocked blades, but still count as shatters.
Reduces the target's <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> by [1].
Reduces the target's <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> by [1].
Using a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Mesmer_Bladesong_Container">Bladesong</LSTag> grants 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GW_AEGIS">Aegis</LSTag>

Whenever a clone would be summoned, you instead stock a blade. Blades persist indefinitely until used. Your shatters are replaced with Bladesongs that consume your stocked blades, but still count as shatters.
Reduces the target's <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> by [1].

Reduces the target's <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> by [1].

Enemies hit by Bladesong Harmony, Bladesong Sorrow or Bladesong Dissonance must succeed a Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or be inflict with 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GW_VULNERABILITY">Vulnerability</LSTag>. After successfully casting a Bladesong, gain 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GW_FURY">Fury</LSTag>.
Automatically stock blades while in combat. At the beginning of every turn gain 2 blades. When you use bladesong while holding 5 blades, refund 2 blades.
Automatically stock blades while in combat. At the beginning of every turn gain 2 blades. When you use bladesong while holding 5 blades, refund 2 blades.
